verbs.description: Ever since First Lady Melania Trump [V: had] to spend five nights in the hospital following a kidney procedure she has not been seen by the public eye in more than two weeks .

Ever since [ARG0: First Lady Melania Trump] had to [V: spend] [ARG1: five nights] [ARGM-LOC: in the hospital] [ARG2: following a kidney procedure] she has not been seen by the public eye in more than two weeks .
Ever since First Lady Melania Trump had to spend five nights in the hospital [V: following] [ARG2: a kidney procedure] she has not been seen by the public eye in more than two weeks .
Ever since First Lady Melania Trump had to spend five nights in the hospital following a kidney procedure she [V: has] not been seen by the public eye in more than two weeks .
Ever since First Lady Melania Trump had to spend five nights in the hospital following a kidney procedure she has not [V: been] seen by the public eye in more than two weeks .

[ARGM-TMP: Ever since First Lady Melania Trump had to spend five nights in the hospital following a kidney procedure] [ARG1: she] has [ARGM-NEG: not] been [V: seen] [ARG0: by the public eye] [ARGM-TMP: in more than two weeks] .
